definition: osteoma (benign tumor composed of bone-like material)

sentences.english: It was an effective alternative to treat condylar osteoma.
sentences.chinese: 该术式是治疗髁突骨瘤较为理想的方式。

sentences.english: Osteoma should be included in the differential diagnosis of calcified masses in cerebellopontine angle.
sentences.chinese: 在小脑桥脑角之钙化肿块，骨瘤必须列入鉴别诊断。

sentences.english: Osteoma is a common benign bone tumor, usually occurring inside the frontal sinuses and the mandible.
sentences.chinese: 骨瘤是一种很普遍的骨肿瘤，它通常发生于前额窦。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of osteoid osteoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骨样骨瘤的诊断与治疗方法。

sentences.english: Results There were not reports of choroid osteoma denied after checking in pathology.
sentences.chinese: 结果均未见经病理检查后否认的脉络膜骨瘤的报道。

sentences.english: Those that develop in bone are called osteoma.
sentences.chinese: 那些发展，被称为骨样骨瘤。

sentences.english: The complete resection of nidus is the key to treat osˉteoid osteoma.
sentences.chinese: 瘤巢的彻底切除是成功治疗骨样骨瘤的关键。

sentences.english: To date, only less than 50 osteomas of the tongue have been reported in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 目前文献上舌部骨瘤之报告未超过50例。

sentences.english: This is the central nidus of an osteoid osteoma composed of irregular reactive new bone.
sentences.chinese: 图示由不规则反应性新生骨组成的骨样骨瘤。

pinyin: qiang2 zhi2 xing4 ji3 zhu4 yan2

definition: blood tumor/angioma (tumor consisting of a mass of blood vessels)
